storyInfo: With her intended partner suddenly disappeared, Maria is forced to step onto the field alone. A conspiracy comes to fruition, and Maria’s opponents are far more than she expected.

attributes.content: Team battle?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: It’s a two on two, a rather uncommon competition format. Originally, to showcase the teamwork within the Knightclubs, it should’ve been at least three on three or four on four.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No matter the format, you don’t have a Knightclub, so we need to find you a partner.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh... Who am I up against?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The competition schedule says it’s the Snowyheel Knightclub.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...They have some decent archers, and even one knight that uses meteor hammers. I don’t know who you’ll end up against.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Maria’s finally reached the point where we’ll know her opponents by name alone, huh.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ahaha......
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I don’t know if that’s a good thing or a bad thing...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria, defeating Tytus is definitely something worth celebrating, but it also means that there will be a lot more eyes on you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Draw on the lessons you learned from Flametail and Ashlock. Don’t tip your hand.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: It’s important to compromise and work with the corporations when you have to. Times have changed. You can’t hold onto your glory with wins alone.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Why didn’t you help me convince her last time?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I did have a proper conversation with Maria after you slammed the door——By the way, you broke my door that time.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ugh. I’ll cover it...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Where’s V and Kowal?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It’s 'that day'. They’re not back yet.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ah... They’re at the gravesite. Shit, I wanted to ask if he could help repair Maria’s equipment...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Just use his workshop.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: He even said so himself, one time last year, drunkenly. If you ever wanted to, Maria, he would gladly pass on his workshop to you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Eh?! Why haven’t I this before?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Either way, he’s still sworn to never touch the anvil again.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Even after so many years...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It’s hard enough for anyone to let go of the past, let alone us oldies who have nothing but the past.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Lets forget about them for now. Maria, you’ll need to fix up your equipment yourself.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: And then... Do you have a partner in mind?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Me? Umm...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: D-Do I actually not have any knight friends?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That’s why I wanted to introduce you to someone. A known quantity is always safer than getting a random stranger assigned by the Association.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Err, who is it?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Fartooth Knight. She’s an expert archer.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Just like you, she fought her way up as an independent knight, refusing to accept sponsorships from the corporations. I’ve heard she’s even planning to form a completely self-sufficient knightclub.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I think you’ll be able to get along, and cover each other’s weaknesses in battle. You’ll come to understand that team battles are completely different from melees or one-on-ones.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If only we had more time, you could get to know each other better on the training field. Unfortunately, you’ll have to improvise.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...O-okay.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This is the disadvantage of being an independent knight... Temporary allies fighting against a battle-hardened team will always be at a disadvantage.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I wonder what she’s like... I’m a little nervous...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This is our third time passing this street today.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ah, yes, Mr. Czarny...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: You’re very accustomed to such work. Running between the various arenas and joining in countless teleconferences.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ah, no... There’s nothing to be said for someone like me...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Your appearance is somewhat sloppy. One’s appearance is also an important bargaining chip, is it not?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: A-Apologies... To be honest, I was unemployed not too long ago... So...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh... What has that got to do with this?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I don’t dislike employees like you. Only those who have fallen to rock bottom are able to understand the cruelty we face. It is only when you have acknowledged it, that you will be able to make satisfactory decisions.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Remember each and every word I have said, each and every action I have taken.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Eh? Ah, the meeting minutes for the Snowyheel Knightclub? Don’t worry, I’ve prepared——
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No no no, their sponsor is an old friend of mine. They won’t trouble us much.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It’s just for a particularly insignificant...working habit of mine.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You know I never approved of you becoming a competition knight, not since the beginning.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Eh, huh? Where did that come from? I knew that already...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But you’ve proven yourself.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Though it was always by the skin of my teeth...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Rather than your motivations, platitudes, promises or whatnot... Winning in the arena is the only proof of your determination.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Even though you’re still very naive.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ahaha......
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maybe...it’s your desire to win back the glory of the Nearl family that makes you so strong.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ——Though it was just a fluke, being able to take a point off Tytus means your upcoming opponents should be manageable.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You’ve developed your own Arts techniques, but it doesn’t seem to work against particularly strong opponents, unfortunately.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: For example, if the Left-hand Knight had fought seriously from the start, you would’ve probably lost even if there were four of you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I can teach you swordsmanship and tactics, and you can ask V about archery techniques. He may not look it, but back in the day V was an expert your granddad respected.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ——But when it comes to Arts, you are the only one who can grasp your light.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Got it?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Yes... Even though there were unexpected incidents, our plans are progressing on schedule.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: What? No, you’re overestimating our clients. There will definitely not be any condemnation from the audience. They’re not a particularly moral bunch.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Yes, you’re right. I am very thankful for the two... helpers you’ve provided me.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I will ensure that they all receive an excellent report.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Bless you, sir.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...And now, everything is ready.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Let us await the beginning of this remarkable competition.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Oh... you’re back.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Didn’t they promise no rain? Why’d it still end up raining...?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hmph... You really can’t believe all that crap they put on TV, whether it's news, sports or weather forecasts.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: What about Maria! Ain’t the competition today?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I’ve got food and wine for the both of you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: How was it?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Whaddya mean how was it? It’s been so long... There’s a few less this year too.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Always less of us to visit the captain’s grave.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: *Sigh*... She said she’d challenge me to a drinking contest, but she left before the booze was even poured.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Forget it, it’s all in the past.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Yeah... Who’d have expected that the two of you really stayed single your entire lives for her sake.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Stop twisting the knife. Out with the wine!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: That’s right! Enough talk about who’s still alive and who’s not. We’re here to enjoy Maria’s performance!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Cheers, Kowal!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Cheers! V!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Here’s a great bargain for today, self-service for all drinks. Help me watch the joint.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Oh? Is it free?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: In your dreams.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Where’re you going?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The arena.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Huh? You got ahold of a ticket?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...I got someone to get me one. Tickets nowadays are so overpriced.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: That’s called business.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Good day, sir. Here’s the midday sports news.
attributes.name: Newsboy

attributes.content: Thanks, kid. Have some milk.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Nice! Thank you, sir!
attributes.name: Newsboy

attributes.content: The midday sports news, huh——
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ——Wait, what’s this?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Welcome! Welcommme, one and allllll, to the Fireblade Arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The previous match just ended, and the blood of the 'Softwind' Knight still stains the ground. But that’s just seasoning for the next battle!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: No doubt, everybody’s here today to witness the splendor of Nearl——! This lassie here may yet be young, but she’s already done miracles before our very eyes!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: We’ll have an extra short break. In just ten minutes the temporary duo of Maria Nearl and the Fartooth Knight will——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Go against this year’s rookies——The alliance of vengeance formed by elites of past years who’ve failed to enter the Major——The Snowyheel Knightclub!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A brand new legend versus the blade of vengeance, in an all-new two-on-two point match. What an unbelievably thrilling sight! The match shall begin soooon!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Maria, your wounds?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Right! They’re much better now! It’s all thanks to you taking care of me!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright, I believe you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hmm, she’s late... Fartooth has always been bad with time.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It doesn’t matter, as long as she makes it here before the match——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Miss Maria! Miss Maria Nearl! Please head over to the waiting room and get ready! We’re about to begin!
attributes.name: Arena Worker

attributes.content: Ah. It’s about to begin...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’d better get going, Zofia.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Zofia? Where’s Maria?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Marcin? Why’re you here?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Oh... I get it. You’re still waiting for the Fartooth Knight.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She’s not coming.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ——What?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Here, the sports page.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hmm... The Fartooth Knight... seriously injured?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: She got dragged into a fight between knight fans and is now MIA.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: At least, that’s what the paper says.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Wait...she got dragged into a fight?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: This must be fake. What kind of fan violence can cause a battle-hardened knight to 'disappear'?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Wait... could it be...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Right now, the question is what do we do for the match?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Something is wrong, Zofia. Just think about it.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Maria has to forfeit! We’re out of time, follow me——
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No rest for the wicked, eh——What? You still think we’re letting them rest too much? Come on, we’ve got to at least act like we’re clearing up the battlefield, alright?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: How many of you are here for Nearl?! How many of you want to see the lovely Nearl?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Speaking for myself here, as someone who’s followed every step this super rookie has taken, I’ve personally watched this prize pool grow to the king’s ransom it is today!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let’s look at the numbers! Right here, right now, in every city, every village in the country, the crowd watching this fight is in the hundreds of thousands!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Who do we have to thank for this?! I’m sure we all know!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But! I have some tragic news. The Fartooth Knight suffered heavy injuries in the incident last night and remains missing!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Even so! Maria did not choose to forfeit! She steps into a two on one fight completely undeterred!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let me see how much her bravery means to each and every one of you!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Presenting——The hottest rookie of this season! Nearl’s little knight, Maria Nearl!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Oh no, is she not here yet? What should I do...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...No, I can’t give up easily. To give up before I’ve even begun is to disrespect knighthood!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Knighthood...yes, knighthood.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And on the other side! Two veterans of the Snowyheel Knightclub!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Back in their old Knightclubs, they failed to make it into the Major two seasons in a row. Looking for a way out, they finally ended up together in this Knightclub of vengeance!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The two members of the Snowyheel Knightclub here today are also well-known knights! They are——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A sudden deafening sound interrupts the announcer.
Wait, what’s this? Am I seeing things?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: N-no, there’s a weird smell, it’s really gross——
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: What’s happening?!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Heavy footsteps resound within the twenty thousand seat arena.
As people regain their senses, the entire place remains silent.
...Ugh.
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A rare occurance in the world of knight sports. In a place that should be packed with vivacious enjoyment, tens of thousands of tourists and spectators hold their breaths, as if listening for the source of the footsteps.
The first to grasp it are VIPs on the grandstand, themselves knights.
...Is that fog on the field? Originium Arts? Or some special equipment?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Is there anyone like that in the Snowyheel Knightclub... hmm...?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: ...No. Not them. It can’t be them.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: That’s——
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: ...Those are, ugh, knights?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: ——Kowal!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I know! I know! Let’s go!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That thing... They’re trying to kill Maria!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Miss, all teams are in position.
attributes.name: Shadow in the Darkness

attributes.content: Don’t be so nervous. We’re here to stop anyone from coming into the arena.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Shadow in the Darkness

attributes.content: But if we have to stop——
attributes.name: Shadow in the Darkness

attributes.content: If that Młynar dares try anything... I’ll deal with him.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Even though it’ll be a huge pain... *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Ugh, so these are the Snowyheel Knightclub’s...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Hey! What’s going on? The deal for the day was——what? Huh? I can’t figure out which of them is——)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ...The Snowyheel Knightclub’s——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The 'Corrupted' and 'Withered' Knights!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The expected cheering does not materialize, as silence envelops the audience.
Naturally, the first thought in their minds is that of terror.
However, they soon come to realize that this terror is not for themselves, seated in the audience, but for the young girl who has not yet understood her situation.
This cruelty brings about a striking round of applause.
This... Isn’t this too scary?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: ...Nearl is going to fight these two all by herself?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Hey... Isn’t this going to be an amazing show?
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Alright, then let’s start the ma——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Target hit.
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: ——Guh!
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Why so... ugh?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Guh... Shield, very durable. Not easy.
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: No matter... Kill her, not difficult.
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: T-They’re already exchanging lightning-fast blows before the match has even started! Is this a problem? Of course not! In fact, the match started the moment the knights stepped onto the field!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Can Nearl turn this around?! Or will she choose to forfeit early——
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (What? Not allowed to forfeit...? This... urgh, fine.)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ——Within each of your hands lies the only way to turn the tide! Invest your money in the pitiful Maria! Maybe those simple little toys will be her key to victory!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ugh... This fog... What is it?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: My Arts are being suppressed...? My wounds, I can’t heal them...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Agh... ouch...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Target... Losing ability to resist. Kill her, quickly, like an accident.
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Understood...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: (No, don’t even think of giving up, think of a way to——)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (These two Sarkaz...are twins? Their Arts are almost the exact same——!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Then... let’s try again!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Eh?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: T-This is unbelievable! What just happened?! There was a sudden explosion on Maria’s body, and the Corrupted Knight followed up with a hit that sent her flying!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (Was that Withered? Corrupted? Does it matter anymore?)
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Nnng——!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*... *cough*.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Blood...? Why... why aren’t my Arts working?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: She is vomiting blood... the Arts have taken effect.
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: ...Fester, wither, decay... I can smell her death. She cannot escape.
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Maria! Forfeit the match! Quickly!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Tsk——
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Let me go! Marcin!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Do you want to die with her?!
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Mph——
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ——Dying together is better than Maria dying alone!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Zofia!
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hurry up, Kowal!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: D-Don’t run so fast. I’m not a Kuranta——
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Sorry, you’re not allowed back here.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You——
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Former level-2 campaign knight, Vogelweide. Or should I say, Batbayar.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Your bloodline had you fighting all over the world. You got to run and howl across the prairies of no-man’s-land.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: And you, senior craftsman of the Craftsman’s Guild, Kowal.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Your master was a great blacksmith, respected by the Silverlance Pegasus, and your apprentices are still out there on the front lines even today——
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: You’re both fine, upstanding Kazimierz citizens. Could you just, like, leave?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...The way you talk ain’t nothing like that lil’ girl I once met, Platinum.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hm. You know?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Yes, we know. Of course we know.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: We have a personal grudge with some of your bosses.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Ah, so that’s how it is.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I heard that the last Platinum’s first job was to assassinate a campaign knight. A really pretty lady, named——
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ——Shut up.
attributes.name: Old Knight & Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Funny. Another leader dying for a woman, in the end.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Maybe working this job too long really does screw with your head. *Sigh* I gotta take a vacation, go traveling...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Stop wasting time with this crap! Are you the ones messing around with Maria?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...Keep watching the perimeter. I’ll deal with this.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Voice in the darkness

attributes.content: So you have helpers after all. Why not call them out?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I really don’t want to fight you. Can we not just take a step backwards?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Hah! That’s funny. An assassin of the Armorless Union has a soft heart?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don’t worry, I won’t go all out against a young lass like you. When you’ve given up, we’ll be off to rescue Maria——
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I... I’m fine. Just a scratch. I just didn’t expect her to draw her bow that quickly and accurately...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Yeah, she’s done talking. She might be young and immature——
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: But she’s still above the dregs of the Armorless Union, as the Platinum in that 'one-two-three inverted triangle' of theirs.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Umm... I’ll take that as a compliment?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Get ready, Kowal. Let’s see if you’ve still got it.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hah! I’ve long suspected that you’re half-blind now, V.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Alright, alright. To you two feisty olds——
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ——Don’t sprain your backs.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Are you leaving now?
Yes, time is tight.
Then... Please be careful. Please, please be very careful.
Don’t worry so much... She’s still with you, right?
...Yes.
Don’t worry, it’s fine. I swear——knight’s honor.
Y-You don’t need to do that. Go on, I believe in you.
Good.
Have a safe journey.
Yes, thank you, Liz.
*Cough* *cough*... *cough*.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (My wounds are rotting, I can’t heal them...! Losing blood... It’s cold...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Faster than Mr. Szewczyk... Bigger than Mr. Ingra...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: These two——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Should I forfeit?
No, just hold on, I can still——
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Hit. She should have fainted. You, go.
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: Guh... Boring fight... Just smash her head in.
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Go, quickly!
attributes.name: Withered Knight

attributes.content: ...The Sarkaz raises his weapon up high.
The sun shines brightly on the girl trying to regain her balance.
Ugh, *cough*...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The blood on the ground, the metallic taste in her mouth, ears buzzing, head spinning, the fragrance of dirt after rain.
She tries to support her body with her hands, but gives in to the intense pain.
(Old wounds... Hands...!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Guh... It’s over.
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Nnng...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria lies on the ground, unmoving. This sorrowful scene is reflected in the Sarkaz knight’s emotionless eyes.
Suddenly, her vision brightens.
Perhaps the clouds blocking out the sun have dissipated, or perhaps the angle of the sunlight just happened to pass through the building’s shade.
The next moment——He hears a thunderous sound. All the cells in his body are warning him, telling him that he must act immediately, that he must strike this defenseless little knight——
His vision brightens even more.
At the same time, the warhammer in his hand flies off, knocked away by someone.
